Text:
Forgive me if I'm being thick here but this torrent is useless. When running the game keeps asking to insert other disks and not having the info it needs to load personalities of opponents. 

The blurb says you will need 1650mb to run this but the file is only 188.75mb. Looks like a lot of the content is missing making it a waste of time.

@mudbone32 :
The game works fine for me. I always CHECK before uploading the torrent.

So its simply a small  matter of configuring your PC.

Hope this helps :)
Forgive me if I'm being thick here too, but this torrent is useless. When running the game keeps asking to insert other disks and not having the info it needs to load personalities of opponents.

I have been playing this game for some time now and I have never noticed the above mentioned error. This is a small sized rip of the game for persons with low download speeds.

I have found out that the full version is more than 1Gb. I may upload the larger version in the days to come....

Thanks for bearing with me and my sincerest apologies for any inconvenience given.

It works Fine for me in windows Xp
Perfect Indeed

Thank you
